category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PortalDesignContextWIPRevRule.Working; Any Status.WIP
preference.preference_description: Revision rules for which QPL builds exist may be associated to Work-In-Process revision rules. WIP selection boxes on the FilterConfigurationPanel (the 3rd screen) will be activated only if such an association is made here. Syntax: PortalDesignContextWIPRevRule.<RuleName>.Suffix. Supported suffix constants are: ".MY_WIP", ".GROUP_WIP", ".WIP"
